bibl.title: A Reused Piece of Paper with a Personal Letter and a List.
Coptica Argentoratensia. Textes et documents de la troisième Université d’Eté de Papyrologie Copte (Strasbourg, 18 - 25 juillet 2010)

bibl.note: Contains (the remains of) four texts written by different hands at different stages. Two of them, a personal letter (a) and a list (c), are written in Coptic. The others (b and d) are the remainders of two texts written in Arabic. Middle Egypt, 2nd half of XIth century.
bibl.seg: 141.13 / 141.8 P. Stras. copte Inv. 133 = P. Stras. Copt. 20
Jelle Bruning, A Reused Piece of Paper with a Personal Letter and a List.

Anne Boud'hors, Alain Delattre, Catherine Louis & Tonio Sebastian Richter (edd.), Coptica Argentoratensia. Textes et documents de la troisième université d'été de papyrologie copte (Strasbourg, 18-25 juillet 2010) (P. Stras. Copt.) = Collections de l'Université de Strasbourg. Études d'archéologie et d'histoire ancienne. Cahiers de la Bibliothèque copte. 19 (Paris, 2014) pp. 199-205 et figg. 45-46.

Contains (the remains of) four texts written by different hands at different stages. Two of them, a personal letter (a) and a list (c), are written in Coptic. The others (b and d) are the remainders of two texts written in Arabic. Middle Egypt, 2nd half of XIth century.
